# Government Tender Announcement
## Services de transcription

### Reference Details
- Reference Number: CB-698-57729967
- Amendment Number: 2
- Solicitation Number: 5000074672
- Publication Date: 2024-04-16

### Tender Information
- Tender Closing Date: 2024-05-27 14:00:00
- Expected Contract Start Date: 2024-07-01
- Expected Contract End Date: 2024-06-30

### Tender Overview
- The Canadian Nuclear Safety Commission (CNSC) invites tenderers to submit bids for the provision of qualified personnel and equipment to record and transcribe audio from public hearings.
- The resultant contract shall be a twelve-month period with a total of five options: four one-year options and one pro-rata option.
- Tenderers must be capable of conducting transcription services in both official languages (French and English) and can provide evidence that the company has partnered with organizations with experience in providing these services.

### Currency and Taxes
- The tender is open to all Canadian firms and organizations operating within Canada, including all levels of government.
- Payments will be made in Canadian dollars according to the rates set for payments on public contracts.

### Contracting Entity Information
- Contracting Entity Name: Canadian Nuclear Safety Commission (CNSC)
- Address: 280 Slater Street, Ottawa, Ontario K1P 5S9
- Region of Delivery: National Capital Region (NCR)

### Corresponding Contact
- Contact Name: Luc Bonhomme
- Contact Information:
